text:
🙏 Got my 2nd shot today! 2 weeks to be #fullyvaxed! 

⚠️ No one tool alone is going to stop the #COVID19 pandemic. A combination of getting a COVID-19 #vaccine, wearing a mask, staying at least 6 feet away from others, and avoiding crowds are ALL needed. https://t.co/Dn2EkjBFuh https://t.co/5MDqkqTjoj
